channel.title: Kotlin Reference on Protocol Buffers Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Kotlin Reference on Protocol Buffers Documentation

item.title: Kotlin Generated Code Guide
item.description: Any differences between proto2, proto3, and editions generated code are highlightedâ€”note that these differences are in the generated code as described in this document, not the base message classes/interfaces, which are the same in both versions. You should read the proto2 language guide, proto3 language guide, and/or the Editions guide before reading this document. Compiler Invocation The protocol buffer compiler produces Kotlin code that builds on top of Java code. As a result, it must be invoked with two command-line flags, --java_out= and --kotlin_out=.
